channel.title: Adding a 'High' feature on PI base. Will Rep++
channel.description: Alright, well i wanna add a feature in my server that gets you high. First, how do i rename the item 'GlassBlowing Pipe' into 'Blunt'. I changed it in my item.cfg but nothing changed. Next i need to add a feature that when you use a tinderbox on it, a bunch of smoke comes up on your screen, prefferably the smoke from the smoke dungeon in desert treasure quest on real rs. Ill Rep++ whoever sets this up for me, as i am not the greatest PI coder..

item.title: Adding a 'High' feature on PI base. Will Rep++
item.dc:creator: @orcashark orcashark
item.description:
@orcashark wrote:

Okay and can you give me the code layout for the part where if i use an item on an item then a certain interface comes up? Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: Adding a 'High' feature on PI base. Will Rep++
